metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8086 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The mod_auth_ldap and mod_auth_ldap2 Community Modules through 2020-01-27for Prosody incompletely verify the XMPP address passed to the is_admin()function. This grants remote entities admin-only functionality if theirusername matches the username of a local admin.

criterions.comment: prosody-modules package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
